SEARCH
Package it.polimi.worker

Class WorkerHandler

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.worker.WorkerHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class WorkerHandler extends Thread
The WorkerHandler class is used to handle the communication between the Coordinator and the Worker. It is used to process the tasks and the reduce messages received from the Coordinator. It is also used to handle the operators and the checkpoints.

  • Constructor Details

    • WorkerHandler

      public WorkerHandler(Socket clientSocket, HadoopWorker hadoopWorker)
      Constructor for the WorkerHandler class.
      Parameters:
      clientSocket - The socket used to communicate with the Coordinator.
      hadoopWorker - The HadoopWorker used to read and write files.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      The run method is used to handle the communication between the Coordinator and the Worker. This method creates input and output streams for communication. It is used to process the tasks and the reduce messages received from the Coordinator.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread

    • handleOperators

      private List<Operator> handleOperators(List<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.MutablePair<String,String>> dataFunctions)
      The handleOperators method is used to create the operators from a list of mutable pairs.
      Parameters:
      dataFunctions - it is the data functions to be used to create the operators.
      Returns:
      The list of operators created.

    • processTask

      private boolean processTask(NormalOperations task)
      The processTask method is used to process the task received from the Coordinator. It reads the input files and processes them using the operators. It also creates the checkpoints for the task.
      Parameters:
      task - it is the task to be processed.
      Returns:
      true if the task was processed successfully, false otherwise.

    • processPartitionTask

      public void processPartitionTask(List<KeyValuePair> result, NormalOperations task, Integer numFile, Integer numPart, Boolean end, String remainingString, boolean writeKeys) throws IOException
      The processPartitionTask method is used to write the keys and create the checkpoints for a partition. This method is invoked by the HadoopWorker after processing a partition.
      Parameters:
      result - it is the result of the partition.
      task - it is the task to be processed.
      numFile - it is the number of the file to be processed.
      numPart - it is the number of the partition to be processed.
      end - it is a boolean value indicating if the partition is the last one.
      remainingString - it is the remaining string to be processed.
      writeKeys - it is a boolean value indicating if the keys should be written.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while writing the keys or creating the checkpoints.

    • computeReduceMessage

      private boolean computeReduceMessage(ReduceOperation reduceMessage)
      The computeReduceMessage method is used to process the reduce message received from the Coordinator. It reads the input files and processes them using the reduce operator. It also retrieves the checkpoints for the reduce message.
      Parameters:
      reduceMessage - it is the reduce message to be processed.
      Returns:
      true if the reduce message was processed successfully, false otherwise.

    • createCheckpoint

      public void createCheckpoint(KeyValuePair result, Integer idx, Integer numFile, Boolean end)
      The createCheckpoint method is used to create the checkpoints for a reduce message. This method is invoked by the HadoopWorker after processing a partition in the second phase.
      Parameters:
      result - it is the result of the partition.
      idx - it is the index of the partition processed.
      numFile - it is the number of the last file processed.
      end - it is a boolean value indicating if the partition is the last one.
